jobDescription: Data ScientistLocation: San Francisco, CA Position type: full-time permanent Job description:San Francisco Mission district based series A 20+ people startup is looking for a Data Scientist who can query, scrape, transform, and analyze data for newsworthy insights and help turn them into articles that not only are fun to read and also provide an essential service to anyone who wants to better understand a neighborhood.
